channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: On a vu le smartphone Samsung ultra rare spécialement conçu pour les JO d’hiver
item.description: Voici à quoi ressemble le Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Olympic Edition spécialement conçu pour les JO d'hiver.

item.title: There’s a tiny digital camera inside these retro 35mm film rolls
item.description: Following the popularity of the Kodak Charmera, it was inevitable that other retro-inspired digital toy cameras would start popping up. While the Charmera's design was inspired by the '80s single-use Kodak Fling camera, the OPT100 Neo Film crams a basic digital camera into a 35mm film roll that comes inside a plastic canister and a […]

item.title: De 100 Go à 100 Mo : Sony a une idée pour faire chuter drastiquement le poids des jeux
item.description: Sony réfléchit à un système qui réduirait drastiquement la taille des jeux à télécharger sur sa console.

item.title: Apple's first-gen AirTags are on sale for $64 for a four-pack
item.description:
At this point, you can find discounts on AirTags fairly often but if you want to spend as little as possible, it's worth waiting for a discount like this. A four-pack of the first-gen Bluetooth trackers is on sale for $64, which is just about a record-low price (only $1 more). That's a 35 percent discount on the pack. Bear in mind that this deal brings the price per AirTag down to about $16 if you were to buy them individually, and when not on sale they usually cost $29.
If you use Apple devices and consider yourself to be a serial thing-misplacer, AirTags are extremely useful. Adding one t...

item.title: La Russie restreint Telegram et coupe WhatsApp
item.description: Les utilisateurs russes de Telegram et de WhatsApp risquent très bientôt de ne plus avoir d'autre choix que de basculer vers la messagerie officielle du Kremlin, ou de passer par un VPN pour continuer à discuter avec leurs apps de prédilection.

item.title: Apple Presidents' Day sales: Get the Apple Watch Series 11 for $299, plus more deals
item.description: Whether you're one of the few people still keeping up with New Year's resolutions or just want an upgraded smartwatch, now is a good time to get an Apple Watch. Currently, the Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299 for Presidents' Day, down from $399. The 25 percent discount brings the 2025 model back down to its record-low price. A number of other Apple devices are on sale for the holiday as well. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear...

item.title: Smartphones, trottinettes, vélos : qu’est-ce que l’emballement thermique, ce phénomène qui transforme les batteries en chalumeau
item.description: Au cœur de notre quotidien, les batteries stockent de l’énergie qui, parfois, peut être libérée de manière incontrôlée. Dans certaines situations, cela peut provoquer un incendie grave, voire une explosion. Et si certaines causes sont techniques, beaucoup de risques découlent aussi des comportements des utilisateurs.

item.title: Ce picoprojecteur ultradesign qui peut projeter des images sur le plafond ou sur le sol coûte moins de 170 € grâce à cette offre
item.description: Design cubique très affirmé, support pivotant à 230°, images en Full HD jusqu'à 130 pouces... Le Wanbo Cube 2 Pro ne manque certainement pas d'atouts. En plus, il n'est même pas hors de prix : Amazon l'affiche à 169,99 euros au lieu de 249,99 euros.

item.title: En images : les moments les plus forts du lancement de Sophie Adenot vers l’espace
item.description: Après des mois de préparation et d’entraînement intensif, Sophie Adenot a finalement pris son envol à bord de Crew-12 pour rejoindre l’orbite terrestre. Un moment marquant qui s’est déroulé sans encombre, et sur lequel Futura vous propose de revenir en images.

item.title: Best Buy goes big for its Presidents' Day sale — I've found the 50 top deals from $25.99
item.description: I've searched through the Best Buy Presidents' Day sale and rounded up 50 of the best deals this weekend on TVs, appliances, laptops, and more top-rated tech.

item.title: Fiat Topolino : la petite voiture électrique sans permis évolue, mais le fait payer
item.description: La Fiat Topolino, petite voiture électrique sans permis de la marque, évolue sur plusieurs points : elle gagne une couleur supplémentaire, un écran LCD couleur... et coûte un peu plus cher, flirtant désormais avec les 10 000 euros.

item.title: Intelligence artificielle | Hollywood accuse le logiciel chinois Seedance 2.0 de violations « massives » du droit d’auteur
item.description: L’association des grands studios hollywoodiens accuse dans un communiqué le logiciel chinois Seedance 2.0, lancé par ByteDance, de violations « massives » du droit d’auteur, après la diffusion d’une vidéo virale générée par l’IA montrant un combat entre Tom Cruise et Brad Pitt.

item.title: 'If someone can inject instructions or spurious facts into your AI’s memory, they gain persistent influence over your future interactions': Microsoft warns AI recommendations are being "poisoned" to serve up malicious results
item.description: AI Recommendation Poisoning is real and already out there, Microsoft warns.

item.title: The Russo Brothers Say Steve Rogers Is Key to ‘Avengers: Doomsday’
item.description: Plus, Liam Neeson is uncommitted about his potential return to 'Darkman'.

item.title: Score, the dating app for people with good credit, is back
item.description: Two years ago, a controversial dating app was launched and quickly shuttered: for people with good-to-excellent credit. Now, the founder is relaunching it, open to anyone.

item.title: What is the release date for A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms episode 5 on HBO Max?
item.description: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms' second-to-last chapter will air very soon – here's when it'll drop where you live.

item.title: 'She's had enough and is starting to take her power back': Under Salt Marsh episode 4 changes one storyline for good — and the cast are all for it
item.description: We're over halfway through Under Salt Marsh now episode 4 is streaming on Sky TV, and one character is set on 'taking her power back'.

item.title: Windows 11 could finally get one of the most-requested features from Windows 10, as Microsoft gets serious about winning over the haters
item.description: How serious is Microsoft about repairing the damaged reputation of Windows 11? Serious enough to bring back moving the taskbar.

item.title: The ridiculously tiny Kodak Charmera captured our hearts (and lots of shoddy pictures)
item.description: Every once in a while, a product comes along that sparks a bit of joy in our jaded hearts. This is what happened with the Kodak Charmera, a $30 tiny toy camera that was nearly impossible to get ahold of in the first couple of months after its release, selling out immediately over waves of blind box restocks. Despite the gimmick of it all, the Charmera was just too cute for some of us to resist, and we sprang when they finally started becoming more readily available. A few of us on the Engadget team have one now, and even with all of its shortcomings, we kind of love this thing. Here's what tw...

item.title: Match Group CEO: Public performance reviews build ‘a culture of transparency’
item.description: ‘Transparency only works if it goes both ways. You can’t expect people to speak up if you don’t show them it makes a difference.’ Since Spencer Rascoff took over as Match Group CEO in early 2025, he has set about trying to revive its portfolio of dating apps, in part by winning back user trust and courting Gen Z. “Trust is the foundation of real connections, and we are committed to rebuilding it with urgency, accountability, and an unwavering focus on the user,” Rascoff said last March in a letter to employees sharing his vision. ...

item.title: Oubliez la Surface Pro : le futur PC hybride de Lenovo corrige le pire défaut de ce format
item.description: Deux ans après la sortie du X12 Gen 2, Lenovo s'apprête à ressusciter son format tablette hybride pour les pros. Plus fin, avec des bordures réduites et un clavier revu pour corriger l'un des plus gros défauts du format, le ThinkPad X13 Detachable a tout pour faire de l'ombre à la Surface Pro de Microsoft.

item.title: This top lawyer at Goldman Sachs just resigned, as close ties with Jeffrey Epstein emerge
item.description: Emails between Kathy Ruemmler and Jeffrey Epstein revealed she described the sex offender as an “older brother.” Kathy Ruemmler, the top lawyer at storied investment bank Goldman Sachs and former White House counsel to President Barack Obama, announced her resignation Thursday, after emails between her and Jeffrey Epstein showed a close relationship where she described him as an “older brother” and downplayed his sex crimes.Ruemmler said in a statement that she would “step down as Chief Legal Officer and General Counsel of Goldman Sachs as of June 30, 2026.”Up until her resignation, Ruemmler r...

item.title: What to do when your colleague keeps making excuses
item.description: Take these five simple steps to solve the problem constructively. If you are dealing with an employee or colleague who consistently underperforms and makes excuses, it can be extremely frustrating. When someone underperforms it not only slows down team progress and lowers the quality of work, but also forces others to take on extra tasks. This increases the workload for the rest of the team, which often means more stress and potential burnout for those left picking up the load....

item.title: One of the thirstiest fighting games ever is coming to PS5 with a new photo mode to 'capture every angle' of your favorite characters — and you'll even be able to play it for free
item.description: Dead or Alive 6 Last Round has been revealed and it's coming out later this year.

item.title: Intelligence artificielle | L’ONU approuve la création d’un groupe scientifique de recherche
item.description: L’Assemblée générale des Nations unies a approuvé jeudi à une très large majorité la création d’un groupe scientifique international de 40 membres chargé d’étudier les impacts et les risques de l’intelligence artificielle (IA), malgré la ferme opposition des États-Unis.

item.title: Waymo is hiring gig workers to close car doors, revealing how autonomous tech quietly relies on human labor
item.description: Whether it’s AI agents or self-driving cars, autonomy is often human-assisted in unexpected ways. From AI tools to self-driving cars, new technologies regularly tout themselves as being autonomous. Yet, their companies often have to recruit us humans for help in unexpected ways.

item.title: Décollage réussi pour Sophie Adenot, mais pas encore arrivée : ces 30 heures cruciales avant l’amarrage
item.description: Ça y est, elle y est ! Sophie Adenot a enfin réalisé son rêve : partir dans l’espace ! Au terme d’un décompte qui s’était fait attendre ces derniers jours à cause des conditions météo, la nouvelle astronaute française et ses coéquipiers ont bien rejoint l’orbite terrestre. Il faudra cependant...

item.title: The new Resident Evil Requiem trailer seems to confirm the appearance of one fan favorite character
item.description: Capcom has shared a fourth trailer for Resident Evil Requiem, and it may have confirmed the appearance of a fan favorite character.

item.title: I didn't think I could be more excited for Star Wars Galactic Racer — then its State of Play trailer confirmed the return of podracing
item.description: Star Wars Galactic Racer looks like the most unhinged game the franchise has ever seen, and I'm thrilled it'll feature one of Episode 1's weirdest little guys.

item.title: IBM says it will actually start hiring entry-level human workers, rather than relying entirely on AI
item.description: IBM still uses AI like every other company, but it's planning to hire more junior workers to plug the gaps that AI leaves open.

item.title: Keep forgetting things? To improve your memory and recall, science says start taking notes (by hand)
item.description: And then do a quick review the next morning. When I spoke at the Arabian Business Awards a few years ago, I showed a slide describing research that shows meetings literally make people dumber: a study published in Transcripts of the Royal Society of London found that meetings cause you to (during the meeting) lose IQ points.

item.title: Meta veut réactiver la reconnaissance des visages dans ses lunettes connectées
item.description: Meta voudrait mettre à profit le bazar politique actuel aux États-Unis pour lancer une fonction de reconnaissance des visages dans ses lunettes connectées.

item.title: I've tested almost all of Dyson's hair gadgets — this is the one I'd recommend for a range of different hair-care goals
item.description: Thinking of investing in a Dyson styler in the Presidents' Day sales? Here's exactly which one I'd recommend for every kind of customer.

item.title: I was about to quit my new year fitness push, but these $190 savings on two of Samsung’s best fitness trackers just gave me a second wind
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Ring and Galaxy Watch 8 are two of the best fitness trackers out there, and you can save $190 on both right now.

item.title: Split Fiction met la coopération à l’honneur et est en forte promo sur Switch 2, Xbox Series et PS5
item.description: Split Fiction est le dernier jeu en date du studio Hazelight, à qui on doit A Way Out et It Takes Two. Comme eux, c'est un jeu exclusivement en coopération que vous retrouvez à 31,13 euros sur Switch 2 et Xbox Series X sur E.Leclerc. Il passe à 36,98 euros sur PS5 sur Amazon, au lieu de 49,99 euros.

item.title: The best noise-cancelling earbuds for all budgets, chosen by a TechRadar expert based on real-world testing
item.description: The best noise-cancelling earbuds block out the world without the bulk of over-ear headphones –here are our top recommendations based on in-house testing

item.title: Spotify : une partie des 300 To de musique « volée » est disponible au téléchargement
item.description: Le catalogue musical de Spotify « sauvegardé » par le collectif Anna’s Archive en décembre dernier a en partie été mis à disposition au téléchargement sur la Toile.

item.title: I’ve spent two months testing the Oura Ring 3 and it’s genuinely still one of the best ways to gain insight into your night’s sleep – especially thanks to this price cut
item.description: After using it to track my sleep for months, I’m happy to say the Oura Ring 3’s sleep tracking still holds up – and that it’s been slashed down to this bargain price.

item.title: Don't buy the Apple Watch SE 3 this Presidents' Day – I'd get this objectively better Apple Watch instead, as it's 25% off
item.description: Valentine's Day is the perfect time to think about caring for your heart – and the ticker-tracking Apple Watch Series 11 is 25% off right now.

item.title: HP's Omen Max 16 laptop with Core Ultra 9, RTX 5080 and 32GB DDR5 is a video editing powerhouse - and it's got a huge $1300 saving for Presidents' Day
item.description: HP’s 16-inch Omen Max laptop comes with an Intel Core Ultra 9 processor, 32GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD, and it’s currently on sale for Presidents Day with a huge 39% discount.

item.title: Le PDG de Binance France victime d’une tentative d’agression à son domicile
item.description: Trois hommes cagoulés et armés ont tenté de s'en prendre à David Princay, le responsable de Binance France, dans le Val-de-Marne. Après avoir fouillé son appartement vide, le trio s'est lancé à la recherche d'un second entrepreneur.

item.title: This Retro ‘Wonder Man’ Trailer Is So Fun, We Wish It Was a Real Movie
item.description: On the heels of Marvel's series starring Yahya Abdul-Mateen II and Ben Kingsley, the studio has unearthed a special treat 'from the archives.'

item.title: Are Waterproof Sneakers Worth It? (2026)
item.description: The idea of having warm, dry feet on your wet, snowy run is appealing. But you might not like the trade-offs.

item.title: The hottest indie game is about breeding cats with ADHD and dyslexia
item.description: When the Mewgenics team announced in 2024 that it had added autism to the list of disorders the game's cats could inherit, developer Edmund McMillen - best known as the co-creator of Super Meat Boy - was unprepared for the reaction. "It was like the most positive response I've ever had to anything I posted," […]

item.title: HP’s laptop subscriptions are a great deal — for HP
item.description: There's been some hullabaloo over HP's laptop subscription service, recently brought to light by a Linus Tech Tips video. And for good reason: it feels like everything is a subscription these days. But it's not just the dystopian feeling that companies are happy to sell you access to movies, music, games, phones, printers, and now […]

item.title: Monster Hunter Stories 3 offers a dream sandbox to catch, train, and grow your team of monsters – but I just can't vibe with it
item.description: After a few hours with the game's opening chapters, I've found Monster Hunter Stories 3 has a lot to offer fans of the series who want to dig into a massive monster-growing and monster-battling sandbox, if you can gel with some of the repetition and its often grating tone.

item.title: Meta really wants you to believe social media addiction is 'not a real thing'
item.description: Meta went to court this week in two major trials over alleged harms facilitated by its platform. In New Mexico, the state's attorney general has accused the company of facilitating child exploitation and harming children through addictive features. In a separate case in Los Angeles, a California woman sued the company over mental health harms she says she suffered as the result of addictive design choices from Meta and others.In both cases, Meta has disputed the idea that social media should be considered an "addiction." On the stand this week, Instagram chief Adam Mosseri said that social med...

item.title: Why does my VPN keep disconnecting?
item.description: One good thing about virtual private networks (VPNs) is that when they don't work, the problem is almost always solvable without technical training. Although it's aggravating when your VPN randomly drops your connection, the chances are good that you can handle the issue yourself without getting tech support involved.If your VPN is repeatedly disconnecting from the server, I recommend dealing with the problem immediately. When you have your kill switch on as good cybersecurity habits dictate, VPN drops will kick you off the internet. Without that feature enabled, it'll expose your real identit...

item.title: I used the Dynabook Tecra A65-M 16-inch business laptop for a week, and the display is its weak link
item.description: A powerful business-focused 16-inch laptop that provides plenty of direct connectivity options, making it ideal for use both in the office and out in the field.

item.title: Ring cuts ties with controversial police tech company after 'dystopian' Super Bowl ad sparks a huge backlash
item.description: Ring has terminated its partnership with Flock Safety, as debates rage about user privacy and law enforcement access.
